definitions: in a manner that is so delicate or precise as to be difficult to analyze or describe

examples.text: the script subtly shifts in tone from comedy to tragedy
the mood and pacing subtly convey a creeping paranoia

shortDefinitions: in manner that is so delicate or precise as to be difficult to analyse or describe

definitions: in a delicately complex and understated way
shortDefinitions: in delicately complex and understated way

definitions: in a clever and indirect way, in order to achieve something

examples.text: he would prattle on about something else for a while before subtly raising the question again
the report subtly shifts blames onto the complainants

shortDefinitions: in a clever and indirect way
